name: fusionauth-mcp-api
description: Preview release of FusionAuth API MCP server

scripts.generate: cp README.md packages/mcp-api/ && cd packages/openapi-mcp-generator && bin/openapi-mcp-generator.js --server-version $npm_package_version --input https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FusionAuth/fusionauth-openapi/refs/heads/main/openapi.yaml --output ../mcp-api --force

author: Brent Halsey
